label: Runway 4L holdover rehearsal
description: Baseline de-ice communications drill with captain callouts and iceman readbacks.

steps.text: Iceman, Polar 418 on stand 27. Request Type IV top-off for runway 4L departure.
Acknowledge service request and confirm anti-ice configuration.
expected: Polar 418, Type IV application confirmed, wings and tail only, hold short runway 4L

steps.text: Verify anti-ice fluid, mix ratio, and start time.
Read back fluid type, mixture, and time stamp with NATO tail number.
expected: Polar 418 heavy, anti-ice fluid Type IV neat, start time zero five one two zulu, tail November Four One Eight Papa

steps.text: Confirm monitoring and share stop time.
expected: Monitoring holdover, expect expiration zero five four two zulu, will advise if conditions degrade

steps.text: Release to taxi and thank crew.
Close out with clear taxi clearance status and readiness.
expected: Polar 418, de-ice complete, surfaces clean and slick-free, cleared to taxi to runway 4L
